5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from ‘Abdur-Rahman bin ‘Uqbah bin Fakih bin Sa’d, from his grandfather Fakih bin Sa’d, who was a Companion of the Prophet (ﷺ) that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to take a bath on the Day of Fitr, the Day of Nahr, and the day of ‘Arafah, and Fakih used to tell his family to have a bath on these days

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الاِغْتِسَالِ فِي الْعِيدَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated about taking a bath on the two ‘Eid
